attributes.title: The worst app I’ve ever downloaded🤮🤮
attributes.review:
This app kept waking my sleep paralysis demon up and making him dance to blackpink’s BOOMBAYAH At 3:27 AM. It also made my dog jump off the roof of my house and fly into outer space bringing back an alien called Neil. Neil kept stealing my wigs to wear while they participated in dancing to blackpink’s BOOMBAYAH with my sleep paralysis demon. Since this app caused all of this it’s getting a bad rating. This app is very much an inconvenience ALSO STREAM NCT DREAM RIDIN’
